data.message: There are ppl going around using eminem((marshall mather)) as their name pretending to be him then ask for money for an orphanage that is out in Africa somewhere saying he doesn't have time to do it because he is busy so he promised to make somebody else do it as he said to me even told them that it was his wife and I needed to get the money to them as soon as possible for his monthly donation so beware because we all know he don't come on here talking to random ass people especially People Like Us or me
